page.title: 13PUBS, RESTAURANTS, INNS
page.content: The Kings Head is on the edge of the village. It sells beer and coffee and snacks and food. The Napton Bridge Inn is by the Oxford canal. The Bridge is a public house and it is a restaurant. There are swings in the garden. It has a bar in it. Lots of people go there. I go there a lot with my dad. It is very nice there. I have cake and crisps and sometimes I have lunch there too. We went to the Crown Public House in the middle of the village. They sell drinks and food. They open at 11.00 am. during the week. They have a games room for dominoes and darts.
